Main.TextJPN: 『祭囃し』へのゲートは、@r＜J.始まりの世界＞の『J1 暇潰し編のカケラ』@r＜K.解明の世界＞の『K1 罪滅し編のカケラ』@r＜K.解明の世界＞の『K2 目明し編のカケラ』@r＜K.解明の世界＞の『K3 皆殺し編のカケラ』@r…以上のカケラを見つけると、＜L.希望の世界＞の『L1 祭囃し編のカケラ』が出てくるの。
Main.TextENG: In order to get ``Matsuribayashi,``@r``J1 A Fragment of Himatsubushi`` in the World of Beginnings@r``K1 A Fragment of Tsumihoroboshi`` in the World of Elucidation@r``K2 A Fragment of Meakashi`` in the World of Elucidation@r``K3 A Fragment of Minagoroshi`` in the World of Elucidation@r...When you find all of the above fragments, ``L1 A Fragment of Matsuribayashi`` will appear in the World of Hope.

Main.TextJPN: それを選択した後に出てくる『L2 カケラ屑』を見て、もう一度『L1 祭囃し編のカケラ』を見れば進めるようになるわ。
Main.TextENG: If you look at ``L2 Leftover Fragments`` after selecting that one, then look at ``L1 A Fragment of Matsuribayashi`` once again, you will be able to proceed.
